The regional Hospital de Vega Baja serves the broader area with comprehensive emergency and specialist services, located approximately 30 minutes away. Closer to Benijofar, several private clinics offer immediate access to physicians, many of whom are English-speaking or have English-fluent staff. Dentistry, physiotherapy, and specialist consultations are readily available throughout the region. Spain's healthcare system is recognized internationally for quality and efficiency, with prescription medications significantly more affordable than in northern Europe. Private health insurance options are accessible and reasonably priced for expatriates.

faqs.question: Är Costa Blanca en bra plats att köpa fastighet?
faqs.answer: Yes, Costa Blanca represents one of Spain's strongest property markets. The region offers proven appreciation (8% year-on-year), established international communities, excellent climate, and diverse lifestyle options. Foreign buyers consistently choose Costa Blanca for retirement, investment, and lifestyle relocation. faqs.question: Kan utlänningar köpa fastighet i Spanien?
faqs.answer: Absolutely, foreigners enjoy unrestricted property purchase rights in Spain—EU and non-EU nationals alike. No special permits or restrictions apply to international buyers. The process requires opening a Spanish bank account, obtaining a NIE (tax identification number), and engaging a qualified legal representative. British and other European buyers have successfully purchased hundreds of thousands of properties throughout Spain with minimal complications.

faqs.question: Vilka är kostnaderna för att köpa fastighet i Spanien?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, expect acquisition costs of approximately 10-12% including: 6% transfer tax (ITP in this region), notary fees (0.5-1%), legal fees (1-2%), and property registry costs. Some sellers negotiate covering certain costs. Mortgage-related fees, surveying, and title insurance add additional costs. Annual ownership costs include property taxes (approximately 0.4-1% of property value), municipal rates, and insurance. Your legal representative provides itemized estimates.

faqs.question: Kan jag få ett bolån i Spanien som utlänning?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreign buyers routinely obtain Spanish mortgages through major banks and specialized lenders. Typical loan-to-value ratios reach 80%, with competitive interest rates comparable to UK mortgages. Spanish banks require standard documentation: proof of income, bank statements, employment verification, and property valuation. EU nationals often qualify more easily; non-EU applicants may encounter slightly stricter requirements. A Spanish legal representative can facilitate lender introductions.

faqs.question: Hur är levnadskostnaderna på Costa Blanca?
faqs.answer: Costa Blanca offers exceptional value compared to northern Europe. Monthly costs for a couple typically range €1,500-€2,500, including rent or mortgage, utilities, groceries, dining, and entertainment. Healthcare costs remain minimal with public system access or affordable private insurance. Fuel, dining out, and utilities cost 30-50% less than UK equivalents. Pensioners frequently live comfortably on €1,200-€1,500 monthly. Your actual costs depend on lifestyle choices and property ownership status.

faqs.question: Är Costa Blanca bra för pensionärer?
faqs.answer: Costa Blanca is one of Europe's premier retirement destinations. The established expatriate infrastructure, English availability, healthcare quality, and cost of living create ideal conditions for retirement. Numerous social clubs, activities, and cultural events prevent isolation. Spain's residency programs facilitate long-term relocation. The climate supports outdoor activities year-round. Healthcare access—both public and private—addresses retiree medical requirements comprehensively.

faqs.question: How far is Costa Blanca from the United Kingdom?
faqs.answer: Alicante Airport (45 minutes from Benijofar) offers direct flights to London and other UK cities, typically requiring 2-2.5 hours flight time plus airport procedures. Budget airlines provide frequent, affordable connections. Driving from UK via ferry/tunnel takes approximately 24-30 hours driving time over 2-3 days. Many UK residents maintain properties in both countries for seasonal living. Video calling and international travel make distance increasingly manageable.

faqs.question: Hur är vädret på Costa Blanca?
faqs.answer: Costa Blanca har medelhavsklimat with over 320 annual sunshine days. Summer temperatures reach 28-32°C (comfortable rather than extreme), while winters average 12-16°C with rare frosts. Spring and autumn provide perfect temperatures of 20-24°C. Annual rainfall is minimal (200-300mm), concentrated in autumn. The climate supports outdoor living throughout the year. Humidity remains moderate, and sea breezes provide natural cooling.
